April 7, 2018 D North American Championships (Third Section)
North American Championships (Third Section) 30 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-3rd-section
United States of America
Third
Lake of the Moon
Embassy Theatre, Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA 8-10.40 am
The overall score is weighted as 60% test piece, 40% remainder of program. First tiebreaker: The band with the highest test piece scores wins. Second tiebreaker: The band rated higher on the test piece by 2 of the 3 judges wins.
Feb. 17, 2018, 9:45 a.m. April 11, 2018, 8:51 p.m.

3 Old Crown Brass Band T. J. Faur Kingdom of Dragons
